story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful mountains of Tajikistan, there lived a young boy named Amir. Amir was a kind and curious child who loved exploring the valleys and forests near his home. Every evening, as the sun began to set behind the mountains, Amir's mother would tell him stories that filled his dreams with wonder and magic.

One night, as Amir lay nestled under his warm blanket, his mother began to tell him a special bedtime story:

"Long ago, in a hidden valley beyond the tallest peaks, there was a majestic unicorn named Roshan. Roshan was the protector of the valley, with a shimmering white coat and a horn that sparkled like a thousand diamonds. Every night, Roshan would roam the valley under the light of the full moon, spreading peace and tranquility wherever he went."

Amir's eyes widened with excitement as he listened to his mother's tale. He imagined himself riding through the valley on Roshan's back, feeling the wind in his hair and the magic of the unicorn's presence all around him.

"Legend has it," his mother continued, "that those who were lucky enough to see Roshan under the full moon would be blessed with good fortune and happiness for the rest of their days."

As Amir drifted off to sleep, his dreams were filled with visions of the enchanting unicorn and the mystical valley beyond the mountains. He knew that Roshan was watching over him, bringing him peace and joy as he journeyed through the land of dreams.

And so, in the quiet of the night, surrounded by the soft glow of the stars and the gentle rustling of the mountains, Amir slept soundly, his heart filled with the magic of the unicorn and the love of his mother.

The end. Goodnight, my dear Amir. Sweet dreams, and may Roshan's presence always bring you peace and happiness.
